text: Éric Boullier (born 9 November 1973) was the team principal of the McLaren Formula One team from 2014 to 2018, and vice-president of Formula One Team Association.Les ambitions d'Eric Boullier, nouveau patron de Renault F1 He graduated from Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées. == References == Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:French racecar drivers Category:Formula One people Category:Alumni of the Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées Category:People from Mayenne Category:Sportspeople from Pays de la Loire
title: Éric Boullier
